scripts.compile: yarn run check-types && yarn run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: yarn run check-types && yarn run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.genoma:run: tsc --project tsconfig.json && node dist/genoma/runCli.js --mode static --purpose research
scripts.genoma:run:strict: tsc --project tsconfig.json && node dist/genoma/runCli.js --mode static --purpose research --citationStrict true
scripts.genoma:report: tsc --project tsconfig.json && node dist/genoma/reportCli.js --mode static --out reports/genoma-report.json
scripts.genoma:phyto: node tools/genoma/eval-phyto-genomics.mjs --out reports/phyto_genomics_report.jsonl --summary reports/phyto_genomics_summary.json --csv reports/phyto_genomics_report.csv --meta reports/phyto_genomics_meta.json --cache reports/.phyto_pubmed_cache.json
scripts.genoma:phyto:rank: node tools/genoma/rank-evidence.mjs --in reports/phyto_genomics_report.jsonl --out reports/phyto_genomics_ranked.json --md reports/phyto_genomics_ranked.md --csv reports/phyto_genomics_ranked.csv
scripts.ci:quality: yarn run check-types && yarn run lint && yarn run test && yarn run eval:quality && yarn run eval:cases && yarn run eval:golden
